page.title: 20Rest Homes for Old People
page.content: There are in the city area a number of {Old People's Homes.}Cornwall is an attractive retirement area, increasing the percentage of older people in the community. There has been an increase in privately run homes and a decrease in state run homes during the past 5 yrs. {Government financing}and changes in the DHSS rules have brought this about. Each Rest Home has to be registered to the{Cornwall C.C.}The proprietor must have certain nursing qualifications or employ others with the required qualifications. The Rest Homes in the area have numbers ranging from 5 to 35 residents. The new rules require a room for each resident and not dormitory type homes.
